text_raw:

Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of February

text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling Event 
Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 536 of 2020) are amended 
in Schedule 1 by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 9 
(inserted by Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and 
Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 652 of 2020)): 

“

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and 
Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 536 of 
2020) to provide for certain penal provisions in the Health Act 1947 (Section 
31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 ( S.I. 
No. 701 of 2020 ) to be fixed penalty provisions.
